testcase.name: Verify all the links on WebPublishing landing page is funcitonal
testcase.system-out: Given Runmode is "Y"........................................................passed Given I am logged into wp.nyu.edu in "Mozilla"..............................passed When I click on "Create" Link...............................................passed Then I should see "Admin_Email_Field".......................................passed When I click on "Support" Link..............................................passed Then I should see "WebPublishing_Help_Label"................................passed When I click on "Updates" Link..............................................passed Then I should see "Recent_Posts"............................................passed And I close the browser.....................................................passed
